trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrar en ordnad par med heltal som anger en <> </> *> och <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The Size class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.
trans-unit.target: Klassen storlek används för att ange en höjd och bredd via den <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>egenskapen för <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>och andra grafik-klasser.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can perform operations on a Size by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan utföra åtgärder på en storlek genom att använda de överlagrade operatorerna som <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, och <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the Size structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: Enhet för den <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>och <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>storlek struktur är beroende av den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>och <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>Inställningar för den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt som används för att rita.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on GetHashCode for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: Du bör undvika beroende på GetHashCode för unika värden som två <xref:System.Drawing.Size>objekt med samma värden för sina <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>och <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>Egenskaper kan returnera samma hash-kod.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: Det här beteendet kan ändra i en framtida version.
